FuncDef: The display optical-module brief command displays information about all optical modules on a device.
Examples: Port        Status Duplex Type          Wavelength RxPower     TxPower     Mode       VendorPN
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To query information about all optical modules on a device, including the interface number, physical status, duplex status, board type, wavelength, and actual transmit/receive optical power, run the display optical-module brief command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
